arm_group.description: VEGF level in hysteroscopic endometrial biopsy of the patients with recurrent pregnancy loss.

brief_summary.textblock:
The aim of this study is determine vascular endothelial growth factor levels and
      angiogenesis/vascularity from hysteroscopic endometrial biopsies which taken from patients
      who has Recurrent Pregnancy Loss.The endometrial vascular endothelial growth factor levels
      will be measured by immunohistochemical staining methods due to office hysteroscopic
      endometrial biopsy after the menstruation at follicular phase of menstrual cycle.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor Levels at Hysteroscopic Biopsies Which Taken From Recurrent Pregnancy Loss
clinical_study.condition: Recurrent Pregnancy Loss Without Current Pregnancy

detailed_description.textblock:
This study is a prospective,observational,single-center study.Ethical approval was obtained
      from the Institutional Review Board.This study will be completed 30 patients with Habitual
      Abortus.

      Endometrial vascular endothelial growth factor levels will be measured using Flk-1 / Kinase
      Domain Receptor / Vascular endothelial growth factor receptor-2, Ab-1 (Rabbit PAb), Vascular
      Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF) Ab-7 (VG1), Cluster of Differentiation 34 (Endothelial Cell
      Marker) Ab-1 (QBEnd/10), Vascular endothelial growth factor receptor-1 (N-term) (FLT1)
      antibody kits. All assays will be performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients with  Recurrent Pregnancy Loss who accept to join the study.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients whose age of <18 and >45

          -  Patients with have any pregnancy.

study_pop.textblock: The patients with  Recurrent Pregnancy Loss

clinical_study.keyword: Vascular endothelial growth factor, Recurrent Pregnancy Loss
clinical_study.official_title: Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor Levels at Hysteroscopic Biopsies Which Taken From Recurrent Pregnancy Loss

primary_outcome.measure: The primary outcome measure of this study is to determine endometrial vascular endothelial growth factor levels in patient with  Recurrent Pregnancy Loss

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case Control, Time Perspective: Prospective
